versions.release_notes:
- Based on an overwhelming response from you on our UPI (Unified Payment Interface) functionality, we have created a UPI Virtual Payment Address (VPA) for all of you. Simply click on Activate Now in the pop-up to claim your UPI ID, if you haven’t created one yet.
UPI is a payment mechanism that allows money transfer between any two bank accounts by using a smartphone. UPI allows you to pay directly from a bank account to your friends and merchants, both online and offline, without any hassle.

- You can now generate a QR code in Pockets for receiving money instantly from other Pockets wallets.
-  We have realigned our Send Money and Receive Money pages for ease of usage
-  The monthly limit of your Pockets wallet has been increased to Rs. 20,000
-  Bug fixes and performance improvements

Bug fixes:
1. Crash fixes reported by some users
2. App getting stuck at splash screen for some users

We have also introduced the ability to request money from contacts.

- Presenting a Brand New home page for Pockets - refreshing, engaging and easily navigable
- Use Pockets to send e-Gift Cards to your friends and family in this festive season
- Now apply for ICICI Bank Two-wheeler loans from within Pockets
- Your statements are now optimized to clearly show you the information you want
- Crash fixes and performance improvements
- Minor enhancements and bug fixes, for making your Pockets experience even better

· A completely new & refreshing look of our login page that will make your login process smooth
· View the latest Pockets offers on our login page itself
· Now get instant recharge benefits for your prepaid / DTH / Datacard service
· Find your billers & do your bill payments much more easily with our simplified bill payment page
· Many more UPI related services for you to use
· Bug fixes and performance improvements

Introducing payments through Unified Payment Interface (UPI) on Pockets. You can now transact (send money, receive money, respond to pay requests) using UPI and manage your Virtual Payment Address, or VPA (for example abc@pockets) from the Pockets app.

· Make credit card bill payments from the Pockets app
· Set up auto pay requests for making credit card bill payments
· Two types of Pockets savings account variants depending on your age
· More types of mVISA QR code variants
· Other bug and crash fixes

1.Now use your Pockets card to transact via mVISA. Simply scan the QR code, choose your Pockets card and complete the payment.
2.A new & simpler user interface for Bill Payments.
3.Revamped offer section with geo-located store offers providing relevant and exclusive discounts across retail stores.
4.Basis your feedback, the length for inputting address details has been increased to 50 characters while applying for a Pockets physical card.
5.Minor bugs fixes.

· Now choose from various popular recharge plans for a better recharge experience.
· Request money from friends/relatives by sharing your Pockets wallet number & IFSC code with ease.
· Pay your Post-Paid and DTH bills right from the recharge screen.
· Refer the Pockets app to your friends.
· Bug Fixes: Fixes for crashes and many other issues reported by you.

Introducing, for the first time in India, a new mobile payment solution Touch & Pay that enables you to make secure contactless payments at retail stores using Pockets.Touch & Pay lets you tap your smartphone at NFC enabled merchant terminals and make payments through your linked ICICI Bank Debit/Credit Card.Click on Touch & Pay icon on Pockets dashboard, select a linked Debit or Credit Card, hold your phone near the merchant terminal and your payment is done!There is no physical card required.

* Simplified registration flow for new customers
* Notification inbox to view notifications
* Easy discovery of services in Settings menu
* Notification to friends when you add them as a favourite
* All your availed coupon codes now available in Saved Deals
* Bug fixes: Movie ticket booking, crash and login issues reported by you

- Option to specify recharge type while recharging mobile.
- View recharge plans.
- Better success rate while adding funds to your wallet.
- Add funds to your wallet by requesting money from friends!
- Crash fixes on some phone models.
- Intelligent notifications directly linking to app screens

1. Culinary Treats (Dining Offers): Search for exclusive discounts on dining in restaurants near you using ICICI Bank Credit and Debit cards
2. Chat enhancements: Faster response to chat messages
3. Shop with pockets: No need to switch apps when shopping with Pockets card. Just copy card details
4. Payback points: View your Payback points in Pockets
5. DTH in recharge section: Quick recharges for DTH connection

* Get exciting offers while applying for physical cards or sending money
* Check the status of add funds transactions from within the app
* Crash fixes on some phone models.
* Better success rate for add funds transactions.

· Track the status of your deliverables like Pockets Physical card, Bank account statements from within the app anywhere anytime.
· Apply for a physical card in a snap.
·Settle due with friends right in their Pockets wallet with the revamped Bill Splitter

· Bug fix for registration issues reported by some users with Dual SIM phones.
· Fix for certain crashes on older Android versions.
· mVisa QR code fixes

· mVISA QR code enhancements
· Bug fix for statements not displaying in some devices
· Crash fixes in some devices

Pockets continues to bring new market leading features for your convenience.

· In this build we introduce mVISA – A brand new way to pay at retail outlets using QR code. Just scan the QR code displayed at merchant outlets and pay with your debit card. (Currently available at select merchants in Bangalore).

· We have altered the NEFT timings as per new guidelines.

· We have fixed bugs related to bill payments, MPIN and detailed statement reported by some users.

•Super quick login by setting MPIN
•Industry first cool way to send money to friends near you using NFC
•Express funding of Pockets wallet by saving your debit card details
•Notification Inbox for any offers you may have missed
•Option to get UserID if you have forgotten it
•Assign pictures to your favorites
•And many bug fixes...

store_info.title: Pockets-UPI,Wallet,QR Payments
store_info.description:
Pockets by ICICI Bank - The most comprehensive mobile wallet to (1) Pay Anyone, (2) Shop Anywhere and (3) Bank with ease for any bank's customer. Pockets is the first app in India to offer UPI, NFC and QR code based payments. With Pockets wallet, you instantly get a free virtual VISA card that can be used for shopping at all online websites/apps. You can even request for a physical card that can be used at stores. Moreover, you can recharge your prepaid mobile or DTH connection and pay your utility bills from within the app. You can send money securely to bank accounts, your contacts or virtual payment addresses using Unified Payment Interface (UPI). That's not all, you can upgrade to a Pockets Savings Account right from the app to get a debit card and create deposits.

New: Introducing payments through UPI. You can now transact (send and collect money) using UPI and manage your Virtual Payment Address or VPA from Pockets. You can also use UPI to pay merchants.

Coming soon: Pockets will soon support the unified India QR code standard.

KEY FEATURES:

1. Shop Anywhere

(a) VISA Card – The Pockets pre-paid wallet is a VISA card, which can be used to shop online on websites such as Amazon. You can even get a physical card for payments at shops! Use it for small value payments without disclosing your debit/credit card details.

New: In store payments using UPI, NFC Touch & pay and mVISA QR code.

(b) NFC Touch & pay – Pockets is the first app in India to enable in-store contactless payments by just waving your smartphone near Near Field Communication (NFC) enabled merchant terminals. It leverages the Host Card Emulation (HCE) technology for this solution.

(c) Scan & pay – Make secure cashless payments by scanning mVISA QR codes or UPI QR codes at merchant locations without the need to swipe a card.

2. Pay Anyone

(a) Transfer funds - Transfer funds instantly and securely to bank accounts and your contacts (via UPI, mobile number, email, WhatsApp, Google+). You can also request money from other Pockets wallet users.

New: Pay and collect money from anyone instantly using Unified Payment Interface (UPI). UPI allows secure money transfer without disclosing bank account details.

(b) Prepaid Mobile Recharge - Recharge your Airtel, Vodafone, Idea, Reliance, Tata, Aircel, BSNL, MTS & MTNL connections.

(c) Bill Payment - Pay utility bills such as Reliance Energy, BSES, NDPL, BEST, MSEB, Torent, Mahanagar Gas, Indraprastha Gas, Gujarat Gas.

(d) Postpaid Mobile & Land Line Bill Payment - Pay Postpaid bills for Airtel, Vodafone, Idea, Reliance, Aircel, MTNL.

(e) DTH connection recharge - Recharge your Tata Sky, Dish TV, Airtel, Videocon, Sun.

New: Recharge Tata Sky connection by scanning QR code from your TV with mVISA.

(f) Data Card Recharge - Recharge your Tata Photon, MTS, Reliance cards.

(g) Book Movie tickets - Book movie tickets of INOX, Big Cinemas, Fun Cinemas.

(h) Purchase Gift Vouchers - Purchase online and physical gift vouchers of top brands such as Bookmyshow, Dominos, Café Cofee Day.

3. Bank with ease

(a) Savings Account - Get a Pockets Savings Account by applying from within the app.

(b) iWish Deposit - iWish is a flexible Recurring Deposit that lets you save for your goals as and when you have the funds and earn better interest rates just like a Fixed Deposit. You can also create regular FD/RDs.

(c) Debit Card – Get a debit card which allows you to withdraw cash from ATMs.

4. Awesome Deals - A bundle of specially chosen deals are available right inside the app.

5. Help at Hand - With chat built into the app, support is just a tap away. You can also always call us or email us.

reviews.title: Good app but...
reviews.body: It used to be one of my top favorite apps because of its features and unbeatable UI. Now also the features as outstanding as before, but the UI has become too much cluttered. The organising of all the icons in such clumsy manner makes it really difficult to use this app. Guys work on its UI.. and get the 5 stars.

reviews.title: No PIN for physical card
reviews.body: Pockets physical card does not have a PIN. So anyone can use it in a shop without any difficulty if they found someone's lost card. So this is NOT SAFE.

reviews.title: Security problem
reviews.body: Good. But no security, I have installed in one mobile later I removed sim card and kept in one more mobile still working this seems security violation.

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.body: Nice concept of providing visa card , useful for children. But visa should be pin enabled. Think about that as it is not safe if card get lost..

reviews.title: Unable to login
reviews.body: I am unable to login as mobile number is not getting verified despite of receiving message stating that validation successful.

reviews.title: Good one
reviews.body: UPI has very handy tool that has been bundled with pocket. But some features are not functioning under this. I hope you will improve all the things.

reviews.title: Security
reviews.body: UPI features needs an update. App works even if one removes the sim from the phone. App should not allow UPI transactions without the registered sim at the time of transactions. In short No SIM in phone... UPI features should get disabled. This will enhance more security apart from mpin etc.

reviews.title: Worst
reviews.body: Never install. It took a day to credit money after adding money & now while recharging DTH, amt deducted from wallet but saying that it will take 2 days to recharge DTH

reviews.title: Upi is not stable, rest good
reviews.body: Will Appreciate if upi becomes stable in this app. Also upi qr code could be shown in main menu instead of going in and in and searching it..

reviews.title: Lots of bugs
reviews.body: Multiple times set up MPIN but keeps saying invalid. Randomly when allowed inside many features were buggy and crashing.
Awesome experience with ICICI pocket app

reviews.title: Superb App
reviews.body: Easy Operating and Very Useful

reviews.title: Great
reviews.body: Nice features by ICICI

reviews.title: Worst service
reviews.body: To open a  zero balance account i applied i didn't get any response from the bank they are worst service

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.body: Good promo codes are available... Enjoyed it

reviews.title: No app can beat this app
reviews.body: In future everyone will use it..must have app..use pockets..leave paytm FreeCharge mobikwik...i love pockets great app ever

reviews.title: Wrong feature
reviews.body: As indicated zero balance can be opened but when applied call from the bank for ID n address  I was informed that I am to give a cheque for minimum balance of Rs. 12500.00 for Pocket free account. This I am going to intimate to Ombudsman.

reviews.title: Good app few features will make it great
reviews.body: Good merger of ewallet and upi. Quick and easy setup. Would be great if the wallet can be loaded using a credit card too. Not all payers on board e.g. tata power mumbai, mtnl mumbai etc...

reviews.title: Good app. Need improvement
reviews.body: Unable to use upi using other bank account. Each time i try to send money or check account balance, they say like Sorry unable to process the request

reviews.title: UPI guidelines missing
reviews.body: There should be an option to select VPA from all existing VPAs linked to the account instead of creating new VPA. If VPA is already created using imobile, why to create new VPA under pockets? If pockets can automatically fetch existing account detail, why not VPA? Also, bank of Baroda is missing from the upi bank list.

reviews.title: Poor & Pathetic App
reviews.body: Payment options don't work at all nor can I transfer funds to any other account totally useless application. Why anyone would want to use an app which can't even perform it's own basic functions for which I hope it was developed for.

reviews.title: Verification error
reviews.body: The sms says account verified but the app says verification failed. I tried 3 times, worst app.

reviews.title: Faltu apps
reviews.body: Bhai jab mobile number virify hi nahi ho Raha hai to q virify ka option Diya band kardo ye app Aur Logo pareshan karna bhi useless app don't download

reviews.title: Unlink actual account details from the app
reviews.body: Just got the pockets card. .yet to use the app ... its good but I don't like that the app show details of my actual saving account also ..is login with userid /pass with actual account credentials. ..If yes please remove this also ...The should work independently of actual ICICI saving account. ..

reviews.title: Ridiculous
reviews.body: I created ID but dint get the password now if I use the forgot password link it says to wait for 3 days. Is it s joke, in today's time who waits for 3 days just to start using an online wallet.
Nice Great

reviews.title: Asking for ATM PIN rather than OTP.
reviews.body: When I tried to use this ICICI POCKETS app i felt that the Development team of this app don't have minimum knowledge on Online Payment Wallets. Because when I tried to "Add money" to this app through Debit Card (ICICI POCKETS) it asking for "ATM PIN" Number rather than asking for OTP. Developer's please study the trend and develop the app. If you want people like me to use this app (ICICI POCKETS) just place the OTP option, otherwise people will keep stick on to the other popular online payment Wallets. . .

reviews.body: Easy

reviews.title: Good apps
reviews.body: Great work by icici bank. I love it.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.body: Super

reviews.title: Buttons don't work
reviews.body: Is this a Nougat issue? App not optimized for latest Android? I see lags, stutters and what not on my Pixel. I can't add a card also. There's no option to withdraw money. What the heck.

Issue in UPI.  I've already created my VPA in iMobile and if I try to access the same through pockets, it doesn't show me my VPA. If I try to create a new VPA with the same name as created in iMobile, it says this VPA is already used.

reviews.title: Failed mobile verification
reviews.body: I've received an SMS that my number is activated for Pockets but on app it says failed to verify mobile. I have two phones and both are facing the same problem. What to do?

reviews.body: I like it, it is very easy to use. Must try cashless facility through this application

reviews.title: Unable to verify
reviews.body: I have removed the 2nd SIM and tried verifying. I got the verified SMS but app says not verified. I have received money unable to access it. Crazy. ICICI refund my money

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.body: Excellent
Versatile App !!
Its a good app...but unfortunately my sim got broken and i can't access to my account which has 4001rs balance how can i get my money back?

reviews.title: Good but could be better
reviews.body: I like the app though a couple of suggestions- I can't copy paste the transaction records, and when chatting to operator I get session expired because it takes me time to type! Otherwise a great app and I recommend getting the physical card - another thing, I'd like a PIN number for the card, instant debit is a bit dicey!

reviews.title: App not validating my mobile number
reviews.body: My mobile number is already linked to all icici bank account & regularly receive all transaction messages. I cannot register my mobile number with POCKETS app.

reviews.title: Application pending
reviews.body: I have applied for pockets savings account on 2/12/16 but it wasn't  processed till  now.i emailed to customer service .i got reply after 3 days then i got a message in my mobile that my application will be processed within  1 working day.but already 3 working days passed but nothing imporved.still pending .It was one of the worse experience.it means pockets customers has no value so they are neglected. Which is very unprofessional way of doing business.

reviews.title: 're thinking
reviews.body: This is really some cool app. But I'm not able to send money from my pockets to other bank because when I tried to add payee it says ( oops some thing went wrong please try again after a while ) for the last 10 days in facing this problem so try to make sure that what is the issue.  Thanks  in advance.

reviews.title: Good application
reviews.body: It is good in some activities but when I tried to pay electricity bill it says successful but two or three days after money came back the payment delayed now working Good

reviews.title: No SBI in net banking banks
reviews.body: YOU CAN NOT ABLE TO PUT MONEY IN POCKET BY INTERNET BANKING IF YOU HAVE SBI ACCOUNT,AND BY DEBIT CARD ONLY 2500 IS ACCEPTED BY ICICI.Still in new version SBI not added in net banking banks

reviews.title: UPI Issue
reviews.body: UPI not working... even real vpa showing not a valid vpa... althogh another works fine with that particular vpa.... One word to say overall not so usefull compare to others app...

reviews.title: Unable to process request,try again later!
reviews.body: Every time it gives out the same message when trying to access UPI.is it cause icici doesn't want customers to use  UPI at all?

reviews.title: Worst wallet app
reviews.body: It doesn't even allow to login we give mobile number it says failed to verify number ,no other wallet app has this type of problem may be the developer team is so possessive that they made it to only for their own use

reviews.title: Latest update, unable to login
reviews.body: If After entering the phone number, in the next page, unable to select the account, and also when the code entered and authenticate,  it says unable to process, try again later

reviews.title: Looting Application
reviews.body: By merely installing and putting the mobile number it deducted ₹ 1.20/- Very bad looting Application that charges user without information.

reviews.title: Problem in Availing BookMyShow Weekend Delight Offer on Pocket
reviews.body: The procedure for availing the offer given on the app mismatches with the reality. Please let me know the exact procedure.

reviews.title: Authentication failed
reviews.body: Unable to even move past the first screen. Received the SMS saying successfully authenticated but unable to move past "enter your mobile number" screen.

reviews.title: Not a good app
reviews.body: Good reviews are kept and criticism and complaints are removed every promo run in a fraud and customer service is worst

reviews.title: Error
reviews.body: I am unable to schedule monthly deposit for I-wish goals. Field is disabled to add the amount.

reviews.title: Lacuna
reviews.body: The only lacuna in this app is that it does not have option to pull payments into wallet from ICICI Credit Card.

reviews.title: Best app among all wallete apps
reviews.body: I have installed and used almost all wallets and didn't find such a good featured wallet thank u icicibank....

reviews.title: Lovely App.
reviews.body: A Wonderful App. Especially The NEFT has No Transfer Charges. Would Love to See More Cashbacks on this App Though.

reviews.title: Love It So..  So.. So.. Much :)
reviews.body: I really Love this pocket App by ICICI it really helps me a Lot.Thank u so much ICICI BANK for providing us a better Service Hats off...

reviews.title: Super worst app ever
reviews.body: Never ever did i get irriated so much tat this worst app has made me to do.. This app irritated me by cancelling transaction again and again so much that i wish i had never installed it in the first place.

reviews.title: Not able to add my SBI account
reviews.body: It says account list not available for this bank.please fix this.
